scripts.test:e2e: cd tests/e2e && GRAPH_NODE_BASE_IMAGE=graphprotocol/graph-node:latest docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml up --exit-code-from runner
scripts.test:e2e:m1: cd tests/e2e && GRAPH_NODE_BASE_IMAGE=graph-node:latest docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml up --exit-code-from runner
scripts.test:e2e:ci: cd tests/e2e && GRAPH_NODE_BASE_IMAGE=graphprotocol/graph-node:latest docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.ci.yml up --exit-code-from runner
scripts.run:local: cd tests/e2e && GRAPH_NODE_BASE_IMAGE=graph-node:latest docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.local.yml up
scripts.deploy:alchemy-sepolia-dev: yarn prepare:sepolia-dev && export $(cat .env | xargs) && graph deploy art-blocks-sepolia-dev --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz --deploy-key $ALCHEMY_DEPLOY_KEY
scripts.deploy:alchemy-sepolia-staging: yarn prepare:sepolia-staging && export $(cat .env | xargs) && graph deploy art-blocks-sepolia-staging --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz --deploy-key $ALCHEMY_DEPLOY_KEY
scripts.prepare:mainnet: yarn codegen:generic && mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare:sepolia-staging: yarn codegen:generic && mustache config/sepolia-staging.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare:sepolia-dev: yarn codegen:generic && mustache config/sepolia-dev.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare:arbitrum-sepolia-staging: yarn codegen:generic && mustache config/arbitrum-sepolia-staging.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare:arbitrum-one: yarn codegen:generic && mustache config/arbitrum-one.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare:base: yarn codegen:generic && mustache config/base.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.prepare:local: yarn codegen:generic && mustache config/local.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml
scripts.codegen:generic: yarn generate:abis && mkdir -p ./generated && rm -r ./generated && mustache config/generic.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen
